Financial Performance & Updates (as of August 20, 2025)

For the quarter ending June 2025, revenue was reported at Rs 1,766.27 Crore, with net profit reaching Rs 212.70 Crore. Annual revenue for 2025 was Rs 6,387.88 Crore, and net profit was Rs 815.11 Crore.

The company's debt to equity ratio improved to 0.09 in 2025 from 0.27 in 2024.

Recent corporate actions include an investor presentation submission and the 22nd Annual General Meeting.

Dividends & Stock Splits (as of August 20, 2025)

KPR Mill has a history of distributing dividends, including a final dividend of Rs 2.50 per share announced on May 9, 2025.

The company has also undertaken stock splits.
